title: Hanukkah sufganiyot (Jam doughnuts)
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon dried active yeast', '50ml lukewarm water', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1 sachet vanilla sugar', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '3 tablespoons soured cream', '1 pinch salt', '250g plain flour', 'apple jam or other fruit jam for the filling', 'oil for deep-frying', 'icing sugar for dusting']
